text: Nez Perce County (pron. Nezz Purse) is a county in the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 42,090 people lived there. The county seat and largest city is Lewiston. The county is named after the Nez Perce tribe. == Communities == === Cities === * Culdesac * Lapwai * Lewiston * Peck === Census-designated place === * Sweetwater === Unincorporated communities === * Gifford * Jacques * Lenore * Myrtle * Southwick * Spalding * Waha == References == Category:1864 establishments in Idaho Territory Category:Idaho counties
title: Nez Perce County, Idaho
